title: Drawing, "Design for a Teacup and Saucer, for Castleton China", 1945
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp printed in brown ink at lower right: eva s. zeisel industrial design/431 RIVERSIDE DRIVE NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with measurements; scribble at upper left margin; designer's stamp: April, 1945; tea cup; 1362
description: Elevation and top view of teacup and saucer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Teacup and Saucer, for Castleton China", 1945.
1945. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-2.
